scripts.re: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.build:packages: bun run build:core && bun run build:viem && bun run build:computation
scripts.bump:major: (cd packages/v0-core && bun pm version major) && (cd packages/v0-viem && bun pm version major) && (cd packages/v0-computation && bun pm version major)
scripts.bump:minor: (cd packages/v0-core && bun pm version minor) && (cd packages/v0-viem && bun pm version minor) && (cd packages/v0-computation && bun pm version minor)
scripts.bump:patch: (cd packages/v0-core && bun pm version patch) && (cd packages/v0-viem && bun pm version patch) && (cd packages/v0-computation && bun pm version patch)
